Articles.Content:
Now that VAB/SPH allows to switch lights on/off individually, it would be nice if is also allowed:

- Dim/shut down all the light in VAB, leaving it in deep shadow or complete darkness (e.g. L key)

- Toggle all lights on the design (e.g. U key)

The idea is to be able to check how will the design look in its own lighting when on dark side of the planet.

+1 i always have trouble on placement of light when it's day... u have to wait for night or launch and hope that is good as it is...

i also use them as navigation tool when landing at night, to get visual distance to ground and conformation of the landsite so that will also help to this proupose

Edited March 18, 2014 by Keymaster89
Sounds good to me, another utility that would make us wonder how we lived without.
